resources.string: A former American G.I. joins a yakuza family after his release from prison in post-World War II Osaka.

string-array.item: Wei’s only son, Yu-Hsi, died in an accident. Yu-His’s broken cellphone still sends reminders for all the schedules that he can no longer follow. Wei follows them all, and opens the piano that he bought for his talented…
Two friends scam people online for money.
Dream and reality becomes blurred as a unique fashion model prepares for her runway debut.
